name: Star Explorer - Trijam 121
description:
Simple Space Sim game made in Godot for Trijam-121.

Use `WASD` or arrow keys to fly around.

Honestly this was a bit of a struggle to make the physics somewhat interesting. Not sure I was able to get them to the place where they were interesting.

The world are generated using a uniform simple cluster algorithm, inspired and stolen from Martin Evan's blog post about generating galaxy clusters. I just adapted it for 2D.

Made everything  except the font in ~6 hours. Largely getting familiar with godot physics.

Font : Arcadian
